rules.text: Please be kind and courteous. There’s no need to be mean or rude.

Hate speech, racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of any of the above will not be tolerated and any account engaging in such acts will be suspended immediately.
No sexually explicit or violent content and media of any type are allowed on server.
Please avoid using overtly sexual aliases or other nicknames and sexual avatars/banner images that might detract from a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for all.
No posting or promotion of content (and/or any link to content) that is illegal in the UK or the EU is allowed.
No incitement or promotion of violence will be tolerated.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No spam behaviour is allowed on this server.
Likewise, any spamming, trolling, flaming, baiting or other attention-stealing behaviour, or communication that is not in the spirit of the server, is not welcome.
